comments.html: Great stuff. I am working on an IPv6 multiprotocol lab for knob exploits. Your information is always so helpful to the learning process.
comments.name: jsicuran

comments.html: Correct me if I am wrong, but EUI-64 also flips the 7th bit in the high 24 bits of the MAC address in the host portion, or is this only in certain operating systems?
comments.name: Anonymous
